Class AdminActions

java.lang.Object
application.AdminActions
public class AdminActions extends Object
Application-level fa√ßade for administrator operations. Delegates to domain services instead of talking directly to repositories when possible.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AdminActions()
    Creates an instance with default repositories wired into services.
    AdminActions(MemberService memberService, LoanService loanService)
    Creates an instance with explicit services (no email service).
    AdminActions(MemberService memberService, LoanService loanService, EmailService emailService)
    Creates an instance with explicit services and optional email service.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminActions

      public AdminActions()
      Creates an instance with default repositories wired into services.

    • AdminActions

      public AdminActions(MemberService memberService, LoanService loanService)
      Creates an instance with explicit services (no email service).
      Parameters:
      memberService - the member service to use
      loanService - the loan service to use

    • AdminActions

      public AdminActions(MemberService memberService, LoanService loanService, EmailService emailService)
      Creates an instance with explicit services and optional email service.
      Parameters:
      memberService - the member service to use
      loanService - the loan service to use
      emailService - the email service (may be null)

  • Method Details

    • isAdmin

      public boolean isAdmin(Admin admin)
      Indicates whether the provided admin exists.
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin to check
      Returns:
      true if the admin exists; false otherwise

    • registerMember

      public void registerMember(Admin admin, Member newMember)
      Registers a new member. Only valid online admins may register.
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin performing the registration
      newMember - the member to register
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if admin is not logged in or registration fails

    • unregisterMember

      public void unregisterMember(Admin admin, String memberId)
      Unregisters a member if eligible.
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin performing the action
      memberId - the member identifier (ID)
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if admin is not logged in or member cannot be unregistered
      IllegalArgumentException - if the member does not exist

    • canBeUnregistered

      public boolean canBeUnregistered(Member member)
      Indicates whether a member can be unregistered.
      Parameters:
      member - the member to check
      Returns:
      true if the member has no active loans and no fines

    • borrowMedia

      public Loan borrowMedia(Admin admin, Member member, Media media, LocalDate borrowDate)
      Borrows media for a member using the loan service.
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin performing the action
      member - the borrowing member
      media - the media to borrow
      borrowDate - the borrow date
      Returns:
      the created loan instance
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if admin is not logged in
      IllegalArgumentException - if member or media is null

    • returnMedia

      public void returnMedia(Admin admin, Loan loan, LocalDate returnDate)
      Returns media associated with a loan.
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin performing the action
      loan - the loan to return
      returnDate - the return date
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if admin is not logged in
      IllegalArgumentException - if the loan is null

    • calculateMemberFineSummary

      public double calculateMemberFineSummary(Admin admin, Member member, LocalDate today)
      Calculates total fines for a member as of the given date.
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin performing the action
      member - the member to evaluate
      today - the current date used for calculation
      Returns:
      the total fines associated with the member's loans
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if admin is not logged in

    • searchMemberById

      public Person searchMemberById(Admin p, String memberIdToSearch)
      Searches for a member by ID if the admin is online.
      Parameters:
      p - the admin performing the search
      memberIdToSearch - the member ID to search for
      Returns:
      the person or null if not found or not authorized

    • sendEmailToMember

      public void sendEmailToMember(Admin admin, Member member, String subject, String body)
      Sends an email to a member using the configured email service.
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin performing the action
      member - the target member
      subject - the subject line
      body - the email body
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if admin is not logged in or email service is not configured
      IllegalArgumentException - if the member is invalid or has an empty username

    • borrowMediaTestDuration

      public Loan borrowMediaTestDuration(Admin admin, Member member, Media media, LocalDate borrowDate, int days, int hours, int minutes, int seconds)
      Testing-only polymorphic borrow method with advanced custom duration.
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin performing the action
      member - the borrowing member
      media - the media item
      borrowDate - the borrow date
      days - days (>= 0)
      hours - hours (>= 0)
      minutes - minutes (>= 0)
      seconds - seconds (>= 0)
      Returns:
      the created loan
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if admin is not logged in
      IllegalArgumentException - if member/media are invalid or duration is negative/all zero

    • sendRealEmailToMember

      public void sendRealEmailToMember(Admin admin, Member member, String subject, String body)
      Sends a real email using the configured email service.
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin performing the action
      member - the target member
      subject - the subject line
      body - the email body
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if admin is not logged in or email service is not configured
      IllegalArgumentException - if the member is invalid
